summary: This is my take on Merrill from Dragon age 2. I put some effort into making her actually look like Merrill in the game and making her a worthy companion.
descriptionHtml:
This is Merrill from Dragon age. I tried my best to make it look like Merrill and be a good companion. She summons, heals, and shoots sparks at her enemies. So if you're a Badass 2 handed viking she would be a great companion to have. But since she's so innocent she won't attack Npcs when you order her to, She will however steal for you. You can also Marry her if you please.

You can find her at The Frozen Hearth Inn in Winterhold. She's Been doing Research still trying to get the Mirror to work. But since she likes you so much, she'll put it aside and help you on your Dragonborn aventures!
author: Hunterbuzz
